an7.52:1.4: bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṃ kathaṃ → bhagavato santikā dhammiṃ kathaṃ (bj); bhagavato dhammiṃ kathaṃ (sya-all); bhagavato sammukhā dhammikathaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
an7.52:4.1: sāpekho → sāpekkho (sya-all) | patibaddhacitto → paṭibaddhacitto (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed); patibandhacitto (mr)
an7.52:12.1: na heva → naheva kho (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
